# playerAttributes

**Instance Property**

The player attributes for the match.

## Declaration

```swift
var playerAttributes: UInt32 { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property matches the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKMatchRequest/playerAttributes] property of the match request that the other player uses to create the match.

## Getting Properties

- **sender**: The player who sends the invitation.
- **playerGroup**: The player group for the match.
- **isHosted**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you host the game on your own servers.
- **inviter**: The identifier for the player who sends the invitation.
